home.subtitle: Exploring Cardiac Regeneration Through Developmental Transcriptomics
home.research-focus1: Neonatal (P1 - P6) vs. Postnatal (P7+) Heart Regeneration Capacity:
home.research-focus2: Uncovering the molecular drivers of cardiomyocyte proliferation decline
home.gb-description: View how Genes differ in expression levels accross Age, Cell Groups and Experimental Conditions
home.igv-1: Use the search bar to navigate to a specific gene, or drag on the IGV window to select certain areas. You can view chromatin accessibility (Histone CHIP-seq) and methylation level (WGBS) tracks in IGV.
home.igv-2: Click "Get Differential Expression Data" to get data of each gene.

igv-key.d1: View comparison groups in the card body. You can compare P1 / P8 (Group 1) or Sham / MI (Group 2) currently.
igv-key.d2: Click the card to expand statistical data. Hit any data point on the scatter plot to show UMAP, TSNE and meta information.

pathway.title: Pathway Enrichment
pathway.subtitle: Explore how various pathways are impacted accross Age, and Experimental Conditions

card.d1: Start with gene list from differential expression results
card.d3: Adjust FDR cutoff using slider (default q < 0.05)
card.d4: Export network diagrams or table results

download.title: Search and Download
download.subtitle: Download our Results from our Differential Gene Expression Analysis

card.d1: Modify any search criteria according to your need, then click "Search" button.
card.d2: Select samples in the table and click "Download Standardized Data" to start your download.
card.d3: All files were packed as zip format, as your browser may prevent downloading multiple files at the same time.

p2.btn-get: Get DEG data of all popular genes

p3.btn-get: Get DEG data of entered genes

filterarea.note1: Numbers on the meta plot were hidden if the sample size is less than 2.

body.loading: Data loading. Click Apply to refresh.
body.d1: Clusters with cell type "All Cells" were shown as semi-transparent datapoints.
body.d2: All clusters with -Log10P-val less than 0.01 were hidden in the model plot by default.
body.d3: If you want to view all non-significant clusters, you can navigate to settings page and turn on the switch.

body.no-tsne: TSNE not available for this study

filterarea.go-d: Gene Ontology (GO) annotates and classifies gene sets through BP, CC, and MF.
filterarea.kegg-d: Kyoto Encyclopedia of Genes and Genomes (KEGG) looks at pathways through DEGs.

settings.displaymode-d: The website will follow your system's preferences by default.
settings.fontsize-d: System settings applied to this by default.
settings.nonsig-data-d: Clusters with Adjusted p-value 1.00 in DEG results
settings.yaxis-d: DEG results will always use -Log10(Adj P-val).

body.d: Downloading multiple or large files requires zipping in the backend side which may cause temporary slow down.
